alert.note: Alert for Davis; Salt Lake; Tooele; Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued November 09 at 5:38AM MST until November 09 at 6:30AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Northwestern Salt Lake County in northern Utah... Southwestern Davis County in northern Utah... Northwestern Utah County in northern Utah... Southeastern Tooele County in northern Utah... * Until 630 AM MST * At 538 AM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 13 miles south of Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway to near Dugway English Village, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow and gusty winds leading to blowing snow and rapidly falling visibility. Wind gusts greater than 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 81 and 110. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, Tooele, Grantsville, Dugway English Village, Stansbury Park, Vernon, Ophir, Tooele Army Depot, Tooele Army Depot South, Magna, Bingham Canyon Mine, Skull Valley, Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, Stockton, Rush Valley, Erda, Faust, Lake Point and Antelope Island State Park. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.
